拪字的基本解释

拪
qiān
古同“迁”。

拪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiān］
同“遷1”。
唐李阳冰有《拪先茔记三坟碑》。

拪字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　拪； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页427第17
【集韻】遷古作拪。又作?。註詳辵部十二畫。【六書正譌】作?。【說文】本作?。別作?。字異音同，義亦相近。　又【集韻】余支切，音移。遷徙也。與迻同。古作拪。或作扡，又作?。通作移。

拪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
拪字的起名意思

暂无。

qiān
Ancient Tong "moved".
Ming
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiān］
Same as "Move 1".
Tang Li Yangbing has "The Three Tombs in the Tomb of Ming Xian".
Ming
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　拪; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 427 to 17
【Ji Yun】Move the ancient works. Do it again? Note the twelve paintings in detail. [Liu Shu Zhengzheng] For?. [Said the text] This work?. Don't do it? The different sounds of the characters are the same, and the meanings are similar.　[Jiyun] The remaining branches are cut, and the sound shifts. Migration also. With the same. Ancient works. Or do it again, do it again? Pass for shift.
